result.reason: Feature already exists — Options > Backup page has a disable radio button (rbBackupEnableDisable) that sets BackupFileKeepCount=0, plus individual checkboxes for on-exit/on-edit/on-save backup
result.approach: No changes needed — the disable option is already present in BackupPage with full ACL support

attempts.raw_output:
Based on my analysis, the backup disable option **already exists** in the codebase. The `BackupPage` in Options has a `rbBackupEnableDisable` radio button that sets `BackupFileKeepCount = 0`, and `FileBackupCreator.FeatureIsTurnedOff()` checks exactly that to skip backups. Users can also uncheck `BackupConnectionsOnExit/OnEdit/OnSave`.
